The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 08 February is 37,941 (4,391.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 03 February, there were 1,679 new confirmed cases (194.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 January, there were 2,450 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 31% (771 fewer cases).
